About Us

Team Inspiration

Team Inspiration

To learn, to share, to innovate, to inspire!
Team Inspiration won the 2020 International RoboSub Competition! Learn more.

About Us

We are a 9th-year robotics team from San Diego, California, with students ranging from 8th grade to 12th grade.

We currently participate in the FIRST Tech Challenge, RoboSub, and Donkey Car robotics programs. Our goal is to be able to learn the most we can about robotics and to spread all that knowledge to others, as seen through our team motto: To learn, to share, to innovate, to inspire!

By the Numbers

We're a lot more than a few statistics, but the figures below provide some insight into who we are!

Competitions

What We Do

We compete in several robotics competitions here on Team Inspiration! Click on the buttons below to read a brief overview of what we do.

      • Continue mentoring Benin and Paraguay's FIRST Global teams.
      • Co-hosted an official FTC competition. Hosted and co-hosted 3 other robotics scrimmages.
      • Partner with University of San Diego STEAM Academy to teach STEAM, encouraging students by exposing them to all subjects.
      • Partner with the Fleet Science Center to create videos for Fleet2Go and FLEETtv.
      • Collaborate with Porpoise Robotics in developing low cost underwater Remotely Operated Vehicle for STEM education.
      • Join forces with Krista Mitra High School in Indonesia in creating video tutorials to teach students about engineering concepts that will be applicable to the industries of the future.
      • Tutor online Math and Physics.
      • Create video tutorials for our YouTube channel.
      • Team up with Barboza Space Center and Porpoise Robotics to teach STEAM in California and the Republic of Cabo Verde, Africa.

Contact Us!
